name: What is the Question?
description:
This game is all about solving  cryptograms.  A cryptogram is a type of puzzle that consists of a short piece of encrypted text that can be solved by hand. This game uses substitution ciphers where each letter is replaced by a different letter.

How to solve a cryptogram?

Look for Common Letters. The most common letters in the English language are E, T, A, O, and N, with I and S a close second.

Solve short words and 1,2 and 3 letter words. A one letter word has to be A or I.

Spot the repeated letters. 

Look for words that begin and end with the same letter.

Look for Digraphs. A digraph is two letters that make one sound.
